text: geuleondedo geudeul-eun hananimkkeseo changjohan yeongmaleul geubunkke biyuha yeo geoyeoghago iss-eumyeo geudeul-eun ttohan mujihayeo hananimkke adeulgwa ttaldeul-iissdago hadeola geubunkkeseo yeong-gwang-eul hollo bad-eusoseo geubun-eun geudeul-i myo sahaneun geosgwa jeonhyeo daleun gogwihan bun isila
